name: scadafence
label: SCADAfence
description: SCADAfence that provides full coverage of large-scale networks, offering best-in-class network monitoring, asset discovery, governance, remote access, and IoT device security. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to alerts, assets, and sites.

fields.title: Server
fields.description: Specify the server URL of the SCADAfence server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Account Route
fields.description: Specify the account route that is configured for your account to access the SCADAfence server.
fields.name: x_org

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the SCADAfence server.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Secret Key
fields.description: Specify the Secret key that is configured for your account to access the SCADAfence server.
fields.name: secret_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Alert

parameters.description: Select the severity of alert based on which you want to create alert in SCADAfence. You can choose from the following options: Information, Warning, Threat, Severe, Critical, or Critical.
